ComicInfo.Title: Mad's Celebrity Cause-Of-Death Betting Odds; Sports Suction Catalog; A Mad Look at Photography; Upcoming TV Guide Multi-Covers; The Lighter Side of...; Early One Morning in Midtown Manhattan; Melvin & Jenkins' Guide to Politics; Novelizations of TV Shows as Written by Famous Authors; Of Human Bandage; The 13 Levels of Fading Celebrity Hell; A Mad Peek Behind the Scenes on the Set of Sports Night; hypeline.com; Monroe and… the Doggy; Driver’s License Penalty Points We’d Like to See; Your Summer Camp Romance is Doomed If…; Errant Bra-on-Bitch
ComicInfo.Summary:
Odds on how a celeb will bite the big one.
A cynical look at justice, expenses, cars, neighbors, report cards, therapy, relationships, communication, fashion, praying, the office, quality time, and doctors.
ComicInfo.Writer: Mike Snider,Jeff Kruse,Sergio Aragonés,Desmond Devlin,Dave Berg,Michael Gallagher,Duck Edwing,Darren Johnson,David Shayne,Joe Raiola,Anthony Barbieri,Butch D'Ambrosio,John Caldwell,Dick DeBartolo
